newsitem.title: ITALY: Specialists bid for 18-month and 2-year Italy CTZs.
newsitem.headline: Specialists bid for 18-month and 2-year Italy CTZs.

text.p: Specialist bond traders bid and received 66 billion lire of 18-month zero coupon CTZ bills and 43 billion lire of two-year CTZs against the Italian Treasury's offers of 200 billion and 250 billion lire of paper.

Earlier, the Treasury received bids for 5.770 trillion lire at the open auction for the October 15 1998 18-month paper against two trillion lire worth of certificates on offer, and had bids for 5.376 trillion lire of March 15 1999 two-year paper against 2.5 trillion lire on offer.
The auction price for the 18-month paper was set at 90.65 from 91.25 at a previous CTZ sale on March 25 and for the two-year paper at 88.10 after 87.00.
